overview: Inventive Property Management infuses technology and innovation to provide personal service and expertise across multiple markets, including HOA, rental, self storage, boat slips, multi-family, etc. This simple approach works to control costs for the client and allows management to focus on customer service, improving accuracy, and concentrates on strategies to improve asset values. We focus on providing property management to the North Carolina Piedmont Triad, Raleigh and surrounding markets.
